description.original: This plugin enables you to increase/decrease the size of an image by scrolling
description.translation: 该插件可让您通过鼠标滚动来增大/减小图片大小

dict..setDesc('Key that needs to be pressed d: .setDesc('鼠标滚轮缩放时需要按下的键。')
dict..setDesc('Step value by which the size o: .setDesc('图像尺寸增大/减小的步长值')
dict..setDesc('Initial image size if no size: .setDesc('如果事先未定义图像尺寸，则为初始图像尺寸')
